title: Microphone issue 119
content:
I try to record video screen with 4 app but all 4 app cannot record video with sound from Line application(it can record video call only 5 Secord and app show microphone issue 119 please restart phone, restart issue still happen)(but for normal call can record)

I also try record voice only. It also cannot record voice from Line app too

I am not sure because line app not support to screen record app or my phone have issue.
